text: At an early stage when we didn't have any Investor who believed in the need to look at online pharmacy from an affordability lens, the team at Asha Impact did their market research and built conviction of where the market was going and the opportunity that we were uniquely poised to capture. We are thrilled to have them believe in our vision and help bring onboard other investors

They care about not just the business but you, which is rare in our business. In a market where investors may want you to deliver growth at all costs, they help us to think customer first and build a business on our unique strengths rather than any copy cat playbook

Asha Impact has been instrumental in helping shape our strategy and operating style. They've helped us build a DNA of risk first thinking and the team members aren't afraid to get their hands dirty and be with you in the trenches when needed. I've considered them an extension of our team since they first invested

Asha Impact is the investor you want in your corner. Their faith in the founders and team they have backed is unwavering post investment, which has helped us stay the course even when we hit rough patches and were staring at adverse choices. I value our partnership with the whole team tremendously and actively refer other founders to them
